A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson took a big risk and it paid off. The movie is a ton of fun with great acting all around. Daisy Ridley and Oscar Isaac are the two best performances in my opinion\, but again the cast was really impressive. The movie was shot beautifully and the fight scenes in particular were jaw-dropping. A really really fun movie to see and one that will please the fans if they give it a chance. There is one sequence that it's a little drawn out and doesn't work very well\, but the rest of the movie is incredible! AWESOME installment into this saga!
